title: Initiative: Content and Progression
description: Implement levels, locations, difficulty scaling, and unlockable content.

title: Epic: Level Progression System
description: Implement the 10-level structure with unlocking and star tracking.

title: Design level configuration format
description: Create data format for level definitions including time, goals, difficulty params, location.
acceptance_criteria: Level config format documented. Sample level created.

title: Implement level loading
description: Load level configuration and initialize gameplay with those parameters.
acceptance_criteria: Levels load from configuration. Parameters affect gameplay.

title: Implement level unlock logic
description: Levels unlock sequentially. Completing level N unlocks level N+1.
acceptance_criteria: Levels unlock on completion. Locked levels cannot be played.

title: Implement star rating persistence
description: Save best star rating per level. Display on level select.
acceptance_criteria: Star ratings persist between sessions. Best rating shown on level select.

title: Create 10 level configurations
description: Design and configure all 10 levels with progressive difficulty.
acceptance_criteria: 10 levels defined with increasing difficulty. Each level is playable and beatable.

title: Implement Coming Soon level preview
description: Locked future levels show 'Coming Soon!' with silhouette preview instead of just a lock.
acceptance_criteria: Unreleased levels show anticipation-building preview. Creates excitement for future content.

title: Epic: Location System
description: Implement multiple game locations/backgrounds.

title: Implement location/background system
description: Support swappable backgrounds per level. Include spawn point definitions per location.
acceptance_criteria: Levels can specify location. Background changes based on location.
resolution: Implemented in GameManager with BACKGROUNDS dict and get_level_background(). LEVEL_CONFIG now includes 'location' key. gameplay.gd loads background dynamically. Kitchen L1-3, Paris L4-5, Texas L6-7, Italy L8-10.

title: Create Kitchen location
description: Design and implement kitchen background with appropriate spawn points and hiding spots.
acceptance_criteria: Kitchen location complete with background art and defined interactive areas.
resolution: Kitchen background at assets/backgrounds/bg_kitchen_main.png. Used for levels 1-3.

title: Create additional locations
description: Design 2-3 more locations (living room, backyard, park, etc.).
acceptance_criteria: Additional locations complete and integrated.
resolution: Created 4 locations: Paris (L3-4), Texas (L5-6), Italy (L7-8), Riverside (L9-10). 2 levels per location.

title: Create Thanksgiving bonus location
description: Design Thanksgiving dinner table scene for bonus round.
acceptance_criteria: Thanksgiving location complete with food falling from table mechanic.

title: Add New York City location
description: Add NYC background for Level 2. Part of transition to unique background per level.
acceptance_criteria: NYC location integrated with background and spawn points. Level 2 uses NYC.
resolution: Added bg_nyc_main.png, configured spawn points, Level 2 now uses NYC location.

title: Add Camping location
description: Add camping background for Level 4. Part of transition to unique background per level.
acceptance_criteria: Camping location integrated with background and spawn points. Level 4 uses camping.
resolution: Added bg_camping_main.png, configured spawn points, Level 4 now uses camping location.

title: Add Ashland location
description: Add Ashland background for Level 5. Part of transition to unique background per level.
acceptance_criteria: Ashland location integrated with background and spawn points. Level 5 uses Ashland.
resolution: Added bg_ashland_main.png, configured spawn points, Level 5 now uses Ashland location.

title: Add Cave location
description: Add cave background for Level 6. Part of transition to unique background per level.
acceptance_criteria: Cave location integrated with background and spawn points. Level 6 uses cave.
resolution: Added bg_cave_main.png, configured spawn points, Level 6 now uses cave location.

title: Epic: Difficulty Scaling
description: Implement progressive difficulty across levels.

title: Implement dog availability window scaling
description: Dog catch windows decrease as level progresses and across levels.
acceptance_criteria: Windows get shorter within level and across levels. Configurable per level.

title: Implement dog count scaling
description: Number of simultaneous dogs increases with level (1 to 5).
acceptance_criteria: Dog count scales with level difficulty. Configurable per level.

title: Implement treat speed scaling (catcher)
description: Treats fall faster in higher levels.
acceptance_criteria: Fall speed increases with level. Configurable per level.

title: Document difficulty curve milestones
description: Define expected success rate per level (L1: 85%, L5: 70%, L10: 50%). Document exact parameters.
acceptance_criteria: Per-level targets documented: dog count, window duration, spawn rate, expected success rate.

title: Epic: Unlockables System
description: Implement unlockable treats, toys, hats, and hot dogs.

title: Design unlockables data structure
description: Define data format for unlockable items including type, unlock condition, and assets.
acceptance_criteria: Unlockables format documented. Supports treats, toys, hats, hot dogs.

title: Implement unlock tracking
description: Track which items are unlocked. Persist between sessions.
acceptance_criteria: Unlocks persist. Unlock state queryable.

title: Implement unlock notification
description: Show celebratory notification when new item unlocked.
acceptance_criteria: Unlock triggers celebration UI with item preview.

title: Implement item selection/equip
description: Allow player to select which treat type to throw or hat to wear.
acceptance_criteria: Players can select from unlocked items. Selection reflected in gameplay.

title: Epic: Famous Dogs
description: Implement famous dog unlocks every 3 levels.

title: Research public domain famous dogs
description: Identify 3-4 famous dogs without licensing concerns (Balto, Hachiko, Laika, etc.).
acceptance_criteria: List of 3-4 famous dogs confirmed safe to use with brief descriptions.

title: Create famous dog sprites
description: Design and create sprites for each famous dog character.
acceptance_criteria: Sprites created for all famous dogs matching art style.

title: Implement famous dog unlock triggers
description: Unlock famous dog at levels 3, 6, 9 (and possibly 10 bonus).
acceptance_criteria: Famous dogs unlock at correct levels with celebration.

title: Epic: Thanksgiving Bonus Round
description: Implement special Thanksgiving-themed bonus level.

title: Design Thanksgiving bonus gameplay
description: Define unique mechanics: food falls from table, special food types, bonus scoring.
acceptance_criteria: Bonus round design documented with unique mechanics.

title: Implement Thanksgiving bonus mechanics
description: Build the unique Thanksgiving round gameplay.
acceptance_criteria: Bonus round playable with unique mechanics.

title: Epic: Kid-Friendly Unlocks
description: Replace or supplement famous dogs with unlockables that resonate with young children.

title: Design kid-friendly unlock themes
description: Define unlockable categories that appeal to children: silly costumes, fantasy dogs, size variants.
acceptance_criteria: Unlock themes documented. At least 3 categories defined with 2-3 items each.

title: Create costume dog variants
description: Design dogs in fun costumes: astronaut dog, superhero dog, princess dog, pirate dog.
acceptance_criteria: At least 4 costume variants created. Costumes are visually distinct and fun.

title: Create fantasy dog variants
description: Design fantastical dogs: unicorn dog, dragon dog, rainbow dog.
acceptance_criteria: At least 3 fantasy variants created. Appeal to imagination.

title: Create size variant dogs
description: Design tiny puppy and giant dog variants for variety.
acceptance_criteria: Tiny and giant dog variants created. Gameplay adjusts for size (hitbox, animations).

title: Add fun facts to famous dogs (optional)
description: If keeping famous dogs, add brief fun fact screen so children learn something.
acceptance_criteria: Famous dog unlocks include simple fun fact. Educational but not boring.

title: Define unlock cadence and preview
description: Unlock something every 1-2 levels. Show 'unlock preview' on level select.
acceptance_criteria: Unlock schedule documented. Each level shows what completing it will unlock.

title: Implement unlock preview on level select
description: Show silhouette or hint of what will unlock when completing each level.
acceptance_criteria: Level select shows upcoming unlock. Creates anticipation.

title: Epic: Location Narrative
description: Add simple story framing to explain why dogs are in different locations around the world.

title: Design location narrative concept
description: Create simple story: dog is dreaming, traveling, or on vacation. Explains global locations.
acceptance_criteria: Narrative concept documented. Simple enough for 7-year-old to understand.

title: Create location intro cards
description: Brief intro screen when entering new location: 'Dream 3: Paris!' with simple illustration.
acceptance_criteria: Location intros display before first level in each location. Builds anticipation.

title: Group locations thematically
description: Organize levels: Home (Kitchen, Backyard), Dreams/Vacation (Paris, Italy, NYC, etc.).
acceptance_criteria: Level select shows thematic groupings. Progression feels intentional, not random.

title: Epic: Endless/Replay Mode
description: Add replayable game mode for continued engagement after completing all levels.

title: Design endless mode
description: Define endless mode rules: increasing difficulty, no time limit or extending timer, high score tracking.
acceptance_criteria: Endless mode design documented. Clear progression within the mode.

title: Implement endless mode
description: Build endless mode with gradually increasing difficulty and persistent high score.
acceptance_criteria: Endless mode playable. Difficulty ramps up. High score saved.

title: Consider daily challenge (future)
description: Evaluate adding daily challenge level with unique parameters each day.
notes: Deferred to post-launch. Requires date-based seed system.
acceptance_criteria: Decision documented on whether to pursue daily challenges.
